Clever Solution
----------
Once per attack, when you roll a [b]○[/b] result, any Ranger may draw 1 card.

rangercharactercard.name: Dino Thunder Red (Conner McKnight)
rangercharactercard.description:
Swift Striker
----------
If there is an enemy card in play with the [b]FAST[/b] keyword, you may take the first turn of the battle. If you do, remove 1 die before rolling from the first attack you perform during this battle.

rangercharactercard.name: Green Samurai Ranger (Cameron Watanabe)
rangercharactercard.description:
Super Samurai Mode
----------
At the start of each battle, if Samurai Shield is not in your hand, you [b]must[/b] search your deck and discard pile for that card and swap it with a card from your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

rangercharactercard.name: Navy Thunder Ranger (Blake Bradley)
rangercharactercard.description:
Crashing Thunder
----------
Once per battle, after any Ranger attacks an enemy card with the [b]GUARD[/b] keyword, you may deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card adjacent to the target.

rangercharactercard.name: Crimson Thunder Ranger (Hunter Bradley)
rangercharactercard.description:
Roaring Thunder
----------
Once per battle, after any Ranger attacks an enemy card  without the [b]GUARD[/b] keyword, gain 1 [b]energy[/b].

rangercharactercard.name: Lunar Wolf Ranger (Merrick Baliton)
rangercharactercard.description:
Lone Wolf
----------
During each battle, until another Ranger's card is played, reduce the energy cost of all Lunar Wolf Ranger cards by 1.

rangercharactercard.name: Quantum Ranger (Eric Myers)
rangercharactercard.description:
Quantum Power
----------
At the start of each battle, roll 2 dice and place 1 of them on this card. This is your quantum die. Once during each of your attacks, you may swap 1 die from the attack with your quantum die. The swapped die becomes your new quantum die.

rangercharactercard.name: Time Force Pink (Jen Scotts)
rangercharactercard.description:
Contingency
----------
At the start of each battle, you may choose 2 enemy cards of the same type ([b]Foot Soldier[/b], [b]Monster[/b], [b]Boss[/b]) and swap their positions in the combat sequence.

rangercharactercard.name: Time Force Yellow (Katie Walker)
rangercharactercard.description:
Heavy Force
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger gains [b]energy[/b], you may reduce the amount gained by up to 2 [b]energy[/b], then deal an equal amount of [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

rangercharactercard.name: Time Force Green (Trip)
rangercharactercard.description:
Future Vision
----------
Once per battle, you may look at the top card of any enemy deck. You may swap that card with a non-[b]PASSIVE[/b] enemy card from the same deck that has not yet resolved in the combat sequence. Then shuffle that enemy deck.

rangercharactercard.name: Time Force Blue (Lucas Kendall)
rangercharactercard.description:
Flexibility
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger reveals a card for defense, you may choose a card in your hand. Treat the revealed card as having the shield value of the chosen card.

rangercharactercard.name: Time Force Red (Wes Collins)
rangercharactercard.description:
Willful Strength
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger plays an attack card, you may reveal an attack card with the same energy cost from your hand. Treat the played card as having the attack value of the revealed card (if neither attack value is special).

rangercharactercard.name: Titanium Ranger (Ryan Mitchell)
rangercharactercard.description:
Unbreakable
----------
Once per battle, if your deck is reduced to zero cards, you are not defeated. Instead, recover cards from your discard pile with a total of up to 3 [b]shields[/b].

rangercharactercard.name: Magna Defender II (Mike Corbett)
rangercharactercard.description:
Avenging Knight
----------
Once per battle, after an enemy card deals damage to you, deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to that enemy card.

rangercharactercard.name: Magna Defender I (Nameless Warrior)
rangercharactercard.description:
Old Wounds
----------
Once per battle, if there are 2 cards with the same name in your discard pile, you may add 1 of them to your hand.

rangercharactercard.name: Pink Galaxy Ranger II (Karone)
rangercharactercard.description:
Know Your Enemy
----------
Once per battle, during any Ranger attack, if an effect allows the [b]GUARD[/b] keyword to be ignored, you may gain 1 [b]energy[/b] or deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

rangercharactercard.name: Silver Space Ranger (Zhane)
rangercharactercard.description:
Silver Charm
----------
Once per battle, when you gain any amount of [b]energy[/b], increase that amount by 1.

rangercharactercard.name: Pink Space Ranger (Cassie Chan)
rangercharactercard.description:
Ready to Rock
----------
Once per battle, any Ranger may discard the top card of their deck, then choose 1 card from their discard pile and place it on top of their deck.

rangercharactercard.name: Yellow Space Ranger (Ashley Hammond)
rangercharactercard.description:
Optimism
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger rolls any [b]○[/b] results during an attack, gain 1 [b]energy[/b].

rangercharactercard.name: Blue Space Ranger (T.J. Johnson)
rangercharactercard.description:
Level Headed
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger performs an attack, they may remove up to 2 dice before rolling to add that much [b]¤[/b] to that attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Black Space Ranger (Carlos Vallerte)
rangercharactercard.description:
Hot Blooded
----------
Once per attack, if you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, you may reroll any number of dice during that attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Red Space Ranger (Andros)
rangercharactercard.description:
Covert Tactics
----------
Once per battle, any Ranger may ignore the [b]GUARD[/b] keyword when choosing a target for an attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Phantom Ranger II (Mysterious Hero)
rangercharactercard.description:
Cloaking Device
----------
When you perform a [b]MOVE[/b] action, you may move your figure to or from this card. During any battle, if your figure is on this card, you may move it to that location to join the battle.

rangercharactercard.name: Phantom Ranger I (Morphinaut)
rangercharactercard.description:
Agent Of The Grid
----------
Once per battle, you may flip 1 unused action token to move your figure to this card and recover up to 6 [b]shields[/b]. Return your figure to that location at the start of any Ranger turn or at the end of the battle.

rangercharactercard.name: Blue Senturion (Defender Of Intergalactic Law)
rangercharactercard.description:
In The Name Of The Law
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger plays an attack card, if that card's effect text refers to a keyword ([b]FAST[/b], [b]GUARD[/b], [b]PASSIVE[/b]), gain 1 [b]energy[/b].

rangercharactercard.name: Turbo Red I (Tommy Oliver)
rangercharactercard.description:
Shift Into Turbo
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger plays a card with an energy cost of X, they may resolve it as though they spent +1 [b]energy[/b].

rangercharactercard.name: Zeo Gold II (Jason Lee Scott)
rangercharactercard.description:
Heart of Gold
----------
Each time you play a card, in addition to its normal effects, you may reveal 1 card from your hand and resolve the [GOLD] ability on the revealed card. If you do, place the revealed card on the bottom of your deck and draw 1 card.

rangercharactercard.name: Zeo Gold I (Trey of Triforia)
rangercharactercard.description:
Power of Triforia
----------
Each time you play a card, in addition to its normal effects, resolve the [GOLD] ability on that card. You may spend 1 [b]energy[/b] to resolve that ability a second time.

rangercharactercard.name: Zeo Ranger V Red (Tommy Oliver)
rangercharactercard.description:
Shining Star
----------
Once per battle, you may reveal 1 card from your hand and use the [b]★[/b] ability on that card as if it were revealed for defense.

rangercharactercard.name: Zeo Ranger IV Green (Adam Park)
rangercharactercard.description:
Vanguard
----------
Each time an enemy card deals damage to you, gain 1 hit token and place it on this card (max. 3). You may spend hit tokens from this card to trigger special abilities on your combat cards.

rangercharactercard.name: Zeo Ranger III Blue (Rocky Desantos)
rangercharactercard.description:
Called Shot
----------
At the start of each battle, you may attach 1 energy token to an enemy card of your choice. When an enemy card is defeated, move all attached energy tokens from that card to the shared pool.

rangercharactercard.name: Zeo Ranger II Yellow (Tanya Sloan)
rangercharactercard.description:
Critical Strike
----------
Once during each of your attacks, if you roll any [b]¤¤[/b] die results, add 1 [b]¤[/b] to that attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Zeo Ranger I Pink (Katherine Hillard)
rangercharactercard.description:
One Step Ahead
----------
You may look at the top card of your deck at any time. You may play that card as though it were in your hand.

rangercharactercard.name: White Aquitar Ranger (Delphine)
rangercharactercard.description:
Honor Of Aquitar
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger rolls a [b]○[/b] result during an attack, deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

rangercharactercard.name: Omega Yellow Ranger (Trini Kwan)
rangercharactercard.description:
Omega Earth Power
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger plays an attack card, they may discard another card with the same name from their hand. If they do, add 2 dice to that attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Omega Black Ranger (Zack Taylor)
rangercharactercard.description:
Omega Air Power
----------
Once per battle, at the start of any Ranger turn, you may remove 1 hit token from an enemy card of your choice. If you do, place 1 hit token each on up to 2 other enemy cards.

rangercharactercard.name: Omega Red Ranger (Jason Lee Scott)
rangercharactercard.description:
Omega Fire Power
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger performs an attack, you may remove all [b]○[/b] results from that attack. If you do so, the next time any Ranger performs an attack in this battle, add that many dice to that attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Santa Claus (Father Christmas)
rangercharactercard.description:
Bag of Gifts
----------
At the start of each battle, you may give 1 card from your hand to another Ranger as a gift. When another Ranger plays a card, they may reveal 1 gift, resolve its [b]GIFT[/b] effect, and then place it in your discard pile.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Green II (Matthew Cook)
rangercharactercard.description:
Noble Pursuit
----------
Once per battle, you may place up to 2 dice on this card (max 2). Each time you perform an attack during this battle, you may remove 1 die from this card to add 1 die to that attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Dragon Armor Ranger (Trini Kwan)
rangercharactercard.description:
Black Dragon
----------
At the start of each battle, place the Dragon Claw token on an enemy card of your choice. Rangers may ignore the [b]GUARD[/b] keyword when attacking that card until the end of the battle.

rangercharactercard.name: Rebel Ranger Slayer (Kimberly Ann Hart)
rangercharactercard.description:
Finishing Shot
----------
After the last enemy card in the combat sequence resolves, deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Purple (Farkas "Bulk" Bulkmeier)
rangercharactercard.description:
Big Bully
----------
Once per battle, you may verbally insult 1 enemy card, then discard 1 card from your hand to deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to that enemy card.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Orange (Eugene "Skull" Skullovitch)
rangercharactercard.description:
Wingman
----------
Once per battle, when another Ranger defeats an enemy card, you may offer them a high five. If they accept, that Ranger may choose 1 card from their discard pile and return it to the bottom of their deck.

rangercharactercard.name: Ninjor (Creator of the Power Coins)
rangercharactercard.description:
The Power of Ninja!
----------
Once per battle, each Ranger may look at the bottom card of their deck and may swap that card with a card from their hand.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Pink II (Katherine Hillard)
rangercharactercard.description:
Agile
----------
When you suffer damage, before revealing a card for defense, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Yellow II (Aisha Campbell)
rangercharactercard.description:
Momentum
----------
Once per battle, after you defeat an enemy card with an attack, gain 1 [b]energy[/b].

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Black II (Adam Park)
rangercharactercard.description:
Adaptable
----------
Once per battle, you may swap a card from your hand with the top card of your discard pile.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Red II (Rocky Desantos)
rangercharactercard.description:
Bravery
----------
When you reveal a card for defense, if that card would be placed on the bottom of your deck, you may add it to your hand instead.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin White (Tommy Oliver)
rangercharactercard.description:
Rallying Light
----------
Once per battle, if the shared energy pool is empty, you can add 1 [b]energy[/b] to it.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin White (Tommy Oliver)
rangercharactercard.description:
Live Fearlessly
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger plays the last card from their hand, you may reduce its energy cost to zero.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin White (Tommy Oliver [Vintage])
rangercharactercard.description:
Guardian Light
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger reveals a card for defense, you may add 1 [b]shield[/b] to that card.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin White (Tommy Oliver)
rangercharactercard.description:
Guardian Light
----------
Once per battle, when any Ranger reveals a card for defense, you may add 1 [b]shield[/b] to that card.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Red I (Dragon Shield) (Jason Lee Scott)
rangercharactercard.description:
Legacy of the Dragon
----------
During setup, add the Dragon Shield (Mighty Morphin Red) and Dragon Dagger (Mighty Morphin Red) cards to your starting hand.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Green I (Tommy Oliver)
rangercharactercard.description:
Gift of the Dragon
----------
Once per battle, you may choose one card in your hand and place it on any other Ranger's character card. That Ranger may then play that card as though it was in their hand. After being played, it goes to the bottom of your deck.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Green I (Tommy Oliver)
rangercharactercard.description:
Legends Never Die
----------
When you discard a card for defense, another Ranger may add that card to their hand. For each Ranger with at least 1 of your cards in their hand, add 1 die to each of your attacks. Return those cards to your discard pile when played or when the battle ends.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Green I (Tommy Oliver [Vintage])
rangercharactercard.description:
Loner
----------
If you are the only player with a Ranger in your location, you may add 1 die to each of your attacks.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Green I (Tommy Oliver)
rangercharactercard.description:
Loner
----------
If you are the only player with a Ranger in your location, you may add 1 die to each of your attacks.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Red I (Jason Lee Scott)
rangercharactercard.description:
It's Morphin Time
----------
At the start of each battle, you may initiate a morphing call. If each Ranger in the battle shouts their morphing call, without interrupting each other, the Rangers may ignore the [b]FAST[/b] and [b]GUARD[/b] keywords until the end of the first Ranger turn.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Red I (Jason Lee Scott [Vintage])
rangercharactercard.description:
Leadership
----------
Once per battle, a Ranger of your choice may reroll any number of dice during an attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Red I (Jason Lee Scott)
rangercharactercard.description:
Leadership
----------
Once per battle, a Ranger of your choice may reroll any number of dice during an attack.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Yellow I (Trini Kwan)
rangercharactercard.description:
I've Seen That Before, I'm Not Afraid of It
----------
Once per battle, after you deal at least 1 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card, you may deal 2 [b]¤[/b] to another enemy card with the same name.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Yellow I (Trini Kwan [Vintage])
rangercharactercard.description:
Double Strike
----------
Once per battle, after you play a card, you may immediately play another card with the same name.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Yellow I (Trini Kwan)
rangercharactercard.description:
Double Strike
----------
Once per battle, after you play a card, you may immediately play another card with the same name.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Blue (Billy Cranston)
rangercharactercard.description:
Brains of the Team
----------
Once per battle, you may point out a canonical weakness of an enemy in this battle. If you do, any Ranger may search their deck or discard pile for 1 card of their choice and add it to their hand. If they searched their deck, they must shuffle it.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Blue (Billy Cranston [Vintage])
rangercharactercard.description:
Strategize
----------
Once per battle, a Ranger of your choice may draw 1 card and then place 1 card from their hand back on top of their deck.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Blue (Billy Cranston)
rangercharactercard.description:
Strategize
----------
Once per battle, a Ranger of your choice may draw 1 card and then place 1 card from their hand back on top of their deck.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Pink I (Kimberly Ann Hart)
rangercharactercard.description:
Gymnast's Balance
----------
Once per battle, you may attempt to stack up to 6 dice within 7 seconds using one hand. After you finish, wait 3 seconds, then gain 1 [b]energy[/b] for every 2 dice in the stack.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Pink I (Kimberly Ann Hart [Vintage])
rangercharactercard.description:
Quick Shot
----------
At the start of each battle, you may deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Pink I (Kimberly Ann Hart)
rangercharactercard.description:
Quick Shot
----------
At the start of each battle, you may deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Black I (Zack Taylor)
rangercharactercard.description:
Time for my Slamma-Jamma, Double-Whamma, Hip-Hoppit, 'Cause-Ya-Can't-Stop-It, Big-Disgrace, 'Cause-It's-In-Your-Face, Long Shot!
----------
Once per battle, you may say the name of this ability, then toss a hit token onto the table from at least 3 feet away. If it lands in an outer location, deal 2 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice. If it lands in the Command Center, deal 3 [b]¤[/b] instead.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Black I (Zack Taylor [Vintage])
rangercharactercard.description:
Hip-Hop Kido
----------
Once per battle, after you defeat an enemy card with an attack, you may deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to another enemy card adjacent to your target.

rangercharactercard.name: Mighty Morphin Black I (Zack Taylor)
rangercharactercard.description:
Hip-Hop Kido
----------
Once per battle, after you defeat an enemy card with an attack, you may deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to another enemy card adjacent to your target.

rangercharactercard.name: Alpha 5 [Autonomous Support]
rangercharactercard.description:
A Friend Indeed
----------
At the start of each round, reveal cards from the Alpha 5 deck to refill the row (max 3). Any Ranger may discard 1 card from their hand to play an Alpha 5 card from the row. After resolving it, place it on the bottom of the Alpha 5 deck.

rangercharactercard.name: Alpha 5 [Servant of Zordon]
rangercharactercard.description:
Mission Control
----------
While your figure is in the Command Center, you may participate in battles taking place in outer locations. If you do, you are not considered to be in the battle for the purposes of enemy card effects.

rangercharactercard.name: Alpha 5 [Supportive A.I.]
rangercharactercard.description:
Recovery Boost
----------
When any Ranger performs the [b]RECOVER[/b] action, they may choose to recover up to 2 fewer [b]shields[/b] in order to draw an equal number of cards from the Alpha 5 I deck. When any Ranger plays an Alpha 5 I card, shuffle it back into the Alpha 5 I deck.

rangercharactercard.name: Alpha 5 [Loyal Robot]
rangercharactercard.description:
Aye-yi-yi!
----------
You cannot move from the Command Center. You cannot perform the [b]BATTLE[/b] action, but you may play cards in every battle, regardless of location. When you perform the [b]RECOVER[/b] action, you may allow another Ranger to recover instead.

zordcard.name: Hydra Hyper Zord
zordcard.description:
HyperForce Green
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger discards a card for defense. Place that card on the bottom of their deck. Deal 1 [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

zordcard.name: Phoenix Hyper Zord
zordcard.description:
HyperForce Pink
----------
Exhaust this card to allow a Ranger of your choice to choose a card from their discard pile and return it to their hand.

zordcard.name: Ram Hyper Zord
zordcard.description:
HyperForce Yellow
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger suffers damage to reduce that damage by 3.

zordcard.name: Serpent Hyper Zord
zordcard.description:
HyperForce Blue
----------
Exhaust this card during a battle to flip up to 2 foot soldier cards face down, as though defeated. (Do not remove any foot soldier figures from that location.)

zordcard.name: Cerberus Hyper Zord
zordcard.description:
HyperForce Black
----------
Exhaust this card to deal 1 [b]¤[/b] each to up to 3 enemy cards.

zordcard.name: Lion Hyper Zord
zordcard.description:
HyperForce Red
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger performs an attack to convert all [b]○[/b] results to [b]¤[/b] results.

zordcard.name: Solar Zord
zordcard.description:
Violet Solar Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card when there is no [b]energy[/b] in the shared energy pool. Gain 3 [b]energy[/b].

zordcard.name: Tiger Claw Zord
zordcard.description:
Dino Fury Green Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card after any Ranger performs an attack. During the next Ranger turn in this battle, instead of playing a card, you may perform an attack with half that many dice (rounded down).

zordcard.name: Beast-X King Zord
zordcard.description:
Any Beast Morphers Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger plays a card with an energy cost of X. Resolve that card as though they spent +3 [b]energy[/b] to play it.

zordcard.name: Jet Zord
zordcard.description:
Beast Morphers Silver
----------
Exhaust this card at any time. Any Ranger may choose 2 cards from their discard pile and place them on the bottom of their deck, in any order. They may then draw 1 card.

zordcard.name: Wrecker Zord
zordcard.description:
Beast Morphers Gold
----------
Exhaust this card at any time. Up to 3 different Rangers may each reveal 1 card from their hand. If there is at least 1 copy of that card in their discard pile, they may place that copy on top of their deck.

zordcard.name: Chopper Zord
zordcard.description:
Beast Morphers Yellow
----------
Exhaust this card to allow any Ranger to shuffle their hand into their deck. That Ranger may then draw up to 5 cards.

zordcard.name: Wheeler Zord
zordcard.description:
Beast Morphers Blue
----------
Exhaust this card at any time. Move up to 2 foot soldier figures from any location to an outer location of your choice.

zordcard.name: Racer Zord
zordcard.description:
Beast Morphers Red
----------
Exhaust this card at the start of a battle. Roll 2 dice and deal that much [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

zordcard.name: Spino Zord
zordcard.description:
Dino Charge Dark Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card at any time. Any Ranger may return up to 3 cards from their discard pile to their hand. They must then discard an equal number of cards from their hand.

zordcard.name: Plesio Zord
zordcard.description:
Dino Charge Purple
----------
Exhaust this card after any Ranger plays a card. Place that card on top of their deck instead of discarding it. Another Ranger may then draw up to 2 cards from the bottom of their deck.

zordcard.name: T-Rex Zord
zordcard.description:
Dino Charge Red Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card after any Ranger resolves an attack. If that attack did not defeat the target, roll 2 dice and deal that many [b]¤[/b] to the target.

zordcard.name: Ninja Bull Zord & Robo Racer Zord
zordcard.description:
Ninja Steel Gold Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card after any Ranger plays a card with an energy cost of 1. Another Ranger may immediately play a card with an energy cost of 3.

zordcard.name: Q-Rex Drill
zordcard.description:
Super Megaforce Silver Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card in battle. Roll a number of dice equal to the number of exhausted Zord cards in play. Deal that much [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

zordcard.name: Bullzord
zordcard.description:
Super Samurai Red
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger plays a card to reduce that card's energy cost by 1. If it is an attack, add 1 die to that attack.

zordcard.name: Project Go-Onger
zordcard.description:
Any RPM Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card at any time. Any Ranger may choose 1 card from their discard pile and shuffle it back into their deck, then draw up to 5 cards.

zordcard.name: Wolf Cruiser
zordcard.description:
Ranger Operator Series Black
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger reveals a card for defense. If that Ranger has 3 cards or fewer in their deck, add 3 [b]shields[/b] to the revealed card.

zordcard.name: Tail Spinner
zordcard.description:
Ranger Operator Series Green
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger enters a new location during a battle. That Ranger may draw up to 2 cards and deal an equal amount of [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of their choice.

zordcard.name: Bear Crawler
zordcard.description:
Ranger Operator Series Yellow
----------
Exhaust this card when there is at least 5 [b]energy[/b] in the shared pool. Gain 3 [b]energy[/b].

zordcard.name: Lion Hauler
zordcard.description:
Ranger Operator Series Blue
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger plays a maneuver card. Gain 1 [b]energy[/b]. That Ranger may place that card on top of their deck instead of discarding it.

zordcard.name: Eagle Racer
zordcard.description:
Ranger Operator Series Red
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger performs an attack. That Ranger may add 1 die to that attack and ignore the [b]GUARD[/b] keyword when choosing a target for that attack.

zordcard.name: Lion Animal Spirit
zordcard.description:
Black Lion Warrior
----------
Exhaust this card before any Ranger performs an attack with 3 dice or fewer. Add 2 [b]¤[/b] to that attack.

zordcard.name: Wolf Animal Spirit
zordcard.description:
Jungle Fury Wolf Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card after any Ranger performs a maneuver or reaction. Roll 2 dice and deal that much [b]¤[/b] to an enemy card of your choice.

zordcard.name: Rescue Runners
zordcard.description:
Mercury Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card before any Ranger rolls exactly 3 dice. Treat those dice as if they rolled 1 [b]○[/b] result, 1 [b]¤[/b] result, and 1 [b]¤¤[/b] result.

zordcard.name: Catastros
zordcard.description:
Wolf Warrior
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger uses a [b]★[/b] ability. That Ranger may use that ability two more times.

zordcard.name: White Titan Form
zordcard.description:
White Mystic Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card during any Ranger attack. Convert 1 [b]¤[/b] or [b]¤¤[/b] result to a [b]○[/b] result. If you do, immediately defeat 1 foot soldier card.

zordcard.name: Delta Base
zordcard.description:
S.P.D. Shadow Ranger
----------
Exhaust this card when any Ranger performs the [b]RECOVER[/b] action. That Ranger may recover +4 [b]shields[/b].

zordcard.name: Delta Runner 5
zordcard.description:
S.P.D. Pink Ranger
